name: Shrinking Mashine with automatic passage of the bottles
description:
for simultaneuos operating of 2 bottles
with capacity up to 1200 cyl./h,
for shrinking of PVC shrinking sleeves onto cylinder valves with hot air,
air heating by tube heatingsystem in explosion proof version,
415 V, 50 Hz, approx. 5 kW,
shrinking temperature max. 170° C,
- 2 x shrinking bells;
- all needed ball valves;
- for installation into a chain conveyor,
- complete with pneumatic stopping unit,
- explosion-proof electrical control box for the air
heating system as well as pneumatic control box,
Completely coated,
Painting: RAL 6011
